General.Name: Fiplasto SA
General.Description: Fiplasto S.A. produces and sells hardboard and furniture. It offers a range of products for industry, construction, and home purpose, including chapadur and blackboards; and furniture for bedroom, living, bathroom, and offices. The company offers its products in Germany, Belize, Bolivia, Canada, Chile, China, Costa Rica, Ecuador, El Salvador, Scotland, Spain, the United States, the Philippines, Guatemala, England, Jamaica, Panama, Paraguay, Puerto Rico, Republic Dominican, and Uruguay. Fiplasto S.A. was founded in 1945 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
